graph_title: enrollment of Vanuatu students at USP
page_content: The University of the South Pacific operates in 12 Pacific Island Countries, including Vanuatu, and offers a diverse range of academic programs across various faculties. this standalone indicator will provide data records and  visualizing graduate rates of Vanuatu students at USP which have been consistent over the past decade   with an average rate of 65%. the data records will also help users to conduct own analysis on how this indicator dataset can help understand or identify factors that may impact graduation rates such as increasing cost of higher education, cultural and social dynamics of the 83 islands of Vanuatu, societies and communities. furthermore this standalone indicator data can also be examine as to how it can impact the economic, social and environmental goals of the NSDP framework.
